tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Let's Start With the Basics!

definition.text: You define trading strategies following the Superalgos Protocol!

paragraphs.text: Please, read this page about trading strategies. It is the base of everything we will be discussing!

The last paragraph in the page states that the framework is flexible enough to accept definitions that bend the rigid interpretation of what a position is. In this tutorial, we will focus on a typical by-the-book definition of a strategy, that is, the case for which the framework is optimized. We will cover other cases in other tutorials!
